001package org.nasdanika.persistence;
002
003import java.util.List;
004
005import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
006import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
007
008/**
009 * Objects which know how to load themselves from configuration may implement this interface.
010 * Also this interface may be used as an adapter interface. In this case an object to be loaded is first created by the object loader based on 
011 * type passed to {@link ObjectLoader}'s create() method and then is adapted to this interface to be loaded.
012 * @author Pavel
013 *
014 */
015public interface Loadable {
016        
017        void load(ObjectLoader loader, Object config, URI base, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor, List<? extends Marker> markers);       
018
019}
